Showers early then partly cloudy overnight PERIOD Low around 50F PERIOD Winds S at  to  mph PERIOD Chance of rain  PERIOD

Updated November     pm



When it comes to swimming the UW and Oregon State have traveled down similar paths helping fuel the rivalry in the pool between the two Northwest schools PERIOD The Huskies have had the better part of this rivalry winning all  meets in the series with the Beavers PERIOD

Washington hopes to extend this streak Saturday at  p.m PERIOD when it hosts OSU at the final meet this season in Husky Pool PERIOD

 said Husky coach Mickey Wender PERIOD 

The Husky women defeated the Beavers  last season PERIOD  Wender said 

The Beavers speedsters include breaststroke specialist Birte Steven and distance freestyle expert Naya Higashijima PERIOD Steven owns five of  Beaver records and has collected  eventwins this season PERIOD Higashijima holds the school record for the 1000meter freestyle at . pERIOD

 Wender said PERIOD 

Just like the Huskies the Beavers do not field a diving team thus the competition will be judged solely on swimming events PERIOD The Husky women had difficulties overcoming the 32point diving concession against BYU and dropped the meet  in Provo Utah last week PERIOD

Also like the UW the Beavers swimming program doesnt receive much media attention and its swimming facilities are not up to par with the ones in Stanford or the Arizona schools PERIOD

A positive note for the Huskies is the return of senior captain Irene Schneider to the lineup against OSU PERIOD

 Wender said PERIOD 

Schneider has missed the past three meets due to a cartilagestrain injury PERIOD

 Schneider said PERIOD  The Huskies meet against the Beavers will have a solemn note for freshman swimmer Lisa Fanning PERIOD Fannings grandmother died on Wednesday and Fanning one of the UWs top swimmers will not be present at the meet so she can attend the funeral PERIOD The Huskies swimmers and coaches would like to extend their condolences to the entire Fanning family PERIOD hideshow httpuseragentshow Previous article Next article Copyright2000 The Daily University of Washington
